snippet: Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy of Spain gave support Friday to a campaign by Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain to press for structural changes in the European Union.
abstract: Spanish Prime Min Mariano Rajoy announces support for campaign by British Prime Min David Cameron to press for structural changes in European Union; Cameron says such changes would encourage him to vote affirmatively in referendum on whether Britain should remain in EU.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy of Spain gave support Friday to a campaign by Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain to press for structural changes in the European Union.

headline.main: Spain: Prime Minister Supports E.U. Reforms Sought by Britain
headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Prime Minister Supports E.U. Reforms Sought by Britain
